ssa-disability-insurance-mothers-fathers: Social Security Disability Insurance for Mothers/Fathers
Social Security Disability Insurance for Mothers/Fathers

Social Security Disability Insurance provides financial assistance to people with disabilities and their family members. Complete just one application to be considered for all benefits administered by the Social Security Administration.
A single SSA benefit application will be used to apply to all SSA benefits, but eligibility and approval will be determined for individual benefits.
